title: Bug : Network Warning
body:
I just can't connect to any game, it always Dc before i join the game .
Notes:
1- my internet works perfectly.
2- i re-installed the game and the problem still exists.

replies.body: My league has this exact error. It has been going on for weeks and I have tried everything. If anyone knows how to fix it please help.

This isn't really a bug, but a notification that your network is having some trouble.  Even through your internet works fine, you can still have problems specifically connecting to the game server.  I suggesting going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up, as well as our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings.  Hope that helps!

i fckn hate that u give that answer so many times as a "solution" - it doesnt work for sh** - tell us how to solve it instead of linking us the first thing each logically thinking human being would check first to see if the games bug can be fixed - which ofc is the games own wepsites "issue helper tool things" - which u have linked severel times - for no use. SO GET IT FIXED??? i have now been give 5 additional matches with 20min wait time cus of your ********* PLEASE NOTICE THIS GUY
